channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: The Moment of Proof
channel.desc: A man is conclusively linked to a series of murders at music venues by a shoelace with traces of his final victim's DNA on it. After two people are set upon at a music festival by attackers with the same description, police are in a race against time to find their man, but then a third assault at a nightclub leaves them a vital clue. Also today, coded information buried within a spreadsheet reveals the man responsible for a campaign of hacking and blackmailing that targeted businesses.
